snippet: A new blanket of high-tech lights will add a far more dynamic and dramatic flair to the nighttime view of the Empire State Building.
abstract: A new blanket of high-tech lights will add a far more dynamic and dramatic flair to the nighttime view of the Empire State Building.

headline.main: Bathed in New Lights, Empire State Building Will Star in More Vivid Show
headline.print_headline: Bathed in 1,200 New Lights, Empire State Building Will Star in More Vivid Shows
